message.name: LM_TASK_THUMBBARSETIMAGELIST
message.description: LiteStep sends this message when an application has called ITaskbarList3::ThumbBarSetImageList.

parameter.name: wParam
parameter.description: A handle to the window which is having its thumbbar imagelist set.

remarks.p: To receive this message, modules need to register for it by using LM_REGISTERMESSAGE.
